name: emoji ass blaster
description:
I made this game when I was 13. Basically you just have to stop the enemies from reaching your side of the screen, by shooting them, or touching them with your shield. There are several powerups you can collect by shooting them, these powerups are detailed in a text file that comes with the game. Your aim is to survive for as long as you can.

All of the assets are stolen from the internet, and some of the powerup images are not exactly "child friendly".
